languages.text: Ульфар не сомневается, что проведя шестьсот лет по ту сторону завесы, корабль не мог не поддаться скверне, а значит, должен быть уничтожен без лишних раздумий.

traits.locale_text: Ульфар не сомневается, что проведя шестьсот лет по ту сторону завесы, корабль не мог не поддаться скверне, а значит, должен быть уничтожен без лишних раздумий.

languages.text: Ulfar is adamant that any voidship that has spent the past six centuries beyond the veil is corrupted beyond salvation. He says it must be destroyed at once.
languages.original_text: Ульфар не сомневается, что проведя шестьсот лет по ту сторону завесы, корабль не мог не поддаться скверне, а значит, должен быть уничтожен без лишних раздумий.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar is adamant that a voidship that has spent the past six centuries beyond the veil is corrupted beyond salvation. He says it must be destroyed at once.
Ulfar is adamant that any voidship that has spent the past six centuries beyond the veil is corrupted beyond salvation. He says it must be destroyed at once.
Ulfar is adamant that any voidship that has spent the past six centuries beyond the veil is corrupted beyond salvation. He says it must be destroyed at once.
Ulfar is adamant that any voidship that has spent the past six centuries beyond the veil is corrupted beyond salvation. He says it must be destroyed at once.

languages.text: 乌尔法坚信，无论这是什么舰船，在障壁之外经过六百年之后，都会被彻底腐化，无可救药，必须立刻摧毁。
languages.original_text: Ulfar is adamant that any voidship that has spent the past six centuries beyond the veil is corrupted beyond salvation. He says it must be destroyed at once.

traits.locale_text: 乌尔法坚信，无论这是什么舰船，在面纱之外经过六百年之后，都会被彻底腐化，无可救药，必须立刻摧毁。

languages.text: 過去6世紀をヴェールの向こう側で過ごしたヴォイドシップは、救いようがないほど堕落しているとウルファーは断言する。彼は今すぐ破壊すべきだと言う。
languages.original_text: Ulfar is adamant that any voidship that has spent the past six centuries beyond the veil is corrupted beyond salvation. He says it must be destroyed at once.

traits.locale_text: 過去6世紀をヴェールの向こう側で過ごしたヴォイドシップは、救いようがないほど堕落しているとウルファーは断言する。彼は今すぐ破壊すべきだと言う。

languages.text: Ulfar insiste en que cualquier nave del vacío que haya pasado los últimos seis siglos más allá del velo está corrompida y no tiene salvación. Dice que debe ser destruida de inmediato.
languages.original_text: Ulfar is adamant that any voidship that has spent the past six centuries beyond the veil is corrupted beyond salvation. He says it must be destroyed at once.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar insiste en que cualquier nave del vacío que haya pasado los últimos seis siglos más allá del velo está corrompida y no tiene salvación. Dice que debe ser destruida de inmediato.

languages.text: Ulfar beharrt darauf, dass jedes Raumschiff, das die letzten sechshundert Jahre hinter dem Schleier verbracht hat, ohnehin zu verderbt ist, um es noch zu retten. Er sagt, das Schiff müsse sofort zerstört werden.
languages.original_text: Ulfar is adamant that any voidship that has spent the past six centuries beyond the veil is corrupted beyond salvation. He says it must be destroyed at once.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar beharrt darauf, dass jedes Raumschiff, das die letzten sechshundert Jahre hinter dem Schleier verbracht hat, ohnehin zu verderbt ist, um es noch zu retten. Er sagt, das Schiff müsse sofort zerstört werden.

languages.text: Ulfar n'en démord pas : un vaisseau qui a passé les six derniers siècles de l'autre côté du voile est forcément corrompu au-delà de tout espoir de rédemption. Il insiste pour que vous ordonniez sa destruction immédiate.
languages.original_text: Ulfar is adamant that any voidship that has spent the past six centuries beyond the veil is corrupted beyond salvation. He says it must be destroyed at once.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar n'en démord pas : un vaisseau qui a passé les six derniers siècles de l'autre côté du voile est forcément corrompu au-delà de tout espoir de rédemption. Il insiste pour que vous ordonniez sa destruction immédiate.

languages.text: Ulfar, son altı yüzyılı örtünün ötesinde geçiren herhangi bir uçsuz geminin kurtarılamayacak kadar yozlaşmış olduğunda ısrar ediyor. Derhâl yok edilmesi gerektiğini söylüyor.
languages.original_text: Ulfar is adamant that any voidship that has spent the past six centuries beyond the veil is corrupted beyond salvation. He says it must be destroyed at once.
